name: Densha de GO!
overview:
A 3-D train simulator from Taito.

The game allows you to control the train and be the engineer on four different railroad routes.

The object of the game is to get all passengers to a certain station at a specific destination within the time limit.
The game starts you off with 30 points.

If you arrive late at the station of your destination, you engineer the train dangerously or your passengers complain about rough stops at any of the stations, you will lose points.

Additional points can be earned by engineering the train with experience by stopping exactly at the right spot at ther station and signaling at crossing, tunnels and so on.

The game is also known as Let's Go By Train!.
